doctor.summary: A surgeon skilled in trauma care who secretly heals people.
doctor.abilities: Heal one person each night, preventing them from dying.
doctor.attributes:
You may only Heal yourself once.
You will know if your target is attacked.
Healing will give a Powerful Defense.

detective.summary: A private eye who secretly gathers information.
detective.abilities: Investigate one person each night for a clue to their role.

mafia.goal: Kill anyone who doesn't submit to Mafia.
